metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15118 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
check_input_term in sound/usb/mixer.c in the Linux kernel through 5.2.9mishandles recursion, leading to kernel stack exhaustion.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15118` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-166.195
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-166.195
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-166.195
